title: Orth SL to trade for SL

posts.post_title: Orth SL to trade for SL
posts.post_content:
I have a dupe of Orth with a Piedmont back that I would like to trade for a Southern Leaguer that I need. I have tried to put pictures of the front and back of the card by using an attachment.  Hoping it works.

My wantlist can be found using the link below.  The 206's are toward the bottom. 

Let me know if we can trade.
TJ
